name: Sweet Bingo
description:
One of the most original, simple and fun bingo games now available on iOS!
POPULAR, ORIGINAL and SIMPLE arcade-style game with multiple stages and loads of levels!

• Play up to SIX CARDS all with VARIED GRID SIZES!
• The secret is to play fast and collect sweets and candy.
• The faster you daub, the more coins you earn!
• Use GAME CHANGING power-ups like the "ROCK BOMB" and the "ROCKET LOLLY"!
• Collect FREE COINS EVERY HOUR!
• NO CONFUSING MULTIPLE CURRENCIES. You play with coins to win more coins. SIMPLE!

Here are what the players are saying...

• "Finally a Bingo app you can play without any social or internet players. This is a SWEET game and a big THANKS to the developer!!!"
• "Simply awesome - One of the best games. It's addicting."
• "This is an refreshing change. I love the graphics. Its fluid."
• "Superb game - I play it all the time... Especially while travelling... Love it"
• "One of the best bingo games."

What are you waiting for?? Install and play SWEEEEET BINGO!

Updates, updates, updates!
Send your suggestions: admin@sweet-bingo.com

http://www.sweet-bingo.com
